name: Mercure Apartments Rio De Janeiro Ipanema

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The experience with the hotel was dissapointing from the moment of arrival. They didn't honored the tariff reserved but, what do you do at 20:00 PM in Rio after a 10 hour flight?
reviews.title: Not for the tourist and neither for the business traveler

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is a bad option if you are a tourist. It´s in a main street in the middle of Ipanema and Copacabana so you are not in any of the beaches. Besides, the street is lonely and a bit dark at night so the walk back to the hotel (even for 200 m.) is a bit scary. You probably get sun at the swimming pool in some moment of the day but we never were that lucky... and the gym is a joke!
reviews.title: Great value for money, just few steps from praised Ipanema beach

likes.liked: — Good value for money and superb location

reviews.text: The rooms are OK, with a little kitchenette and a living room with some - old - furniture. Not very livable. The bed was good enough.
reviews.title: Great value!

reviews.text: And If you are travelling for business, don't expect wi-fi or a good working table. They have data ports in the room but, seeing what they charged for the internet conection in the one pc in the minuscule lobby (no privacy at all by the way) you can imagine that if it works, it will be expensive.
reviews.title: Very good hotel

likes.disliked: — A bit further from the beach than I'd prefer

reviews.text: To finish with, breakfast was ample but not very tasty. You feel like in a road motel.
reviews.title: Best avoided

aka: Mercure Apartments Rio De Janeiro Ipanema Hotel
description: Hotel with 63 apartments. The 3 star MERCURE APT IPANEMA is located between the two most famous beaches in Brazil, Ipanema and Copacabana, and 8 kilometres from the centre of Rio. The hotel is only 25 kilometres from the international airport and the famous Wet and Wild fun park. The hotel features an unheated indoor swimming pool, a sauna, a business centre and a parking lot.
